DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate effects of supplementary oxygen during exercise on dyspnoea and exercise tolerance in COPD-patients given long-time oxygen treatment
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Supplementary Oxygen on Dyspnoea and Exercise Tolerance in COPD Patients Given LTOT
DOC.criteria: COPD patients (male/female)given longterm oxygen treatment Able to perform two separate walking tests Severe heart failure
